Member Function Documentation

bool CasPlanner::Astar::inObstacle ( Point  P,
double  theta 
)

Tests whether the robot at this Pose collids.

This method checks for collision between the Robot and the surroundings in the map. This is done by checking if the CasPlanner::Robot::check_points produced by the CasPlanner::Robot class are inside obstacles or not.

bool CasPlanner::Astar::goalReached ( Node *  n  ) 

Checks if the search reached the destination.

This method is used to check if the search reached the goal within a predefined proximity distGoal.

Node * CasPlanner::Astar::startSearch ( Pose  start,
Pose  end,
int  coord 
)

Starts the search for Path from Start Position to the end Position.

This method starts the actual AStar search from the start to the end.

Parameters:
start is the start Pose.
end is the end Pose.
coord is the reference coordinate system to be used (PIXEL or METRIC).
Returns:
The Path which is an list of Node specifying the segment ends.
